verses.text: \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w King|strong="H4427"\w*; let \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* fear: \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w seat|strong="H3427"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* winged ones; let \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w moved|strong="H7264"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*; \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*.

Let \w them|strong="H1931"\w* \w give|strong="H3034"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* \w to|strong="H8034"\w* \w your|strong="H3034"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w for|strong="H1931"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w to|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w*; \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0157"\w* king's \w power|strong="H5797"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w used|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*; \w you|strong="H0859"\w* give true \w decisions|strong="H4941"\w*, judging \w rightly|strong="H4339"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0157"\w* land \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

Give \w high|strong="H7311"\w* honour \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, worshipping \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*; \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w among|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w among|strong="H0413"\w* \w those|strong="H1931"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w gave|strong="H7121"\w* honour \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*; \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H7121"\w* prayers \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w gave|strong="H7121"\w* \w answers|strong="H6030"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w His|strong="H8104"\w* voice \w came|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*; \w they|strong="H1696"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* witness, \w and|strong="H2706"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* law which \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w You|strong="H0859"\w* \w gave|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* sin, though \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w gave|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* punishment \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* wrongdoing.

Give \w high|strong="H7311"\w* honour \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, worshipping \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* faces turned \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.
